_description: A song of Doomsday — one 6-line stanza in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.First Lines:
At domes day we solen vp rise& wenden fort foles &
                    wyse…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…& god of heuene þe hey iustiseWith wondis al blodi
                    Jhesu merci
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 48.
